name: Soul Bound (carpetgames)
description:
In line with the theme of "Joint Together", we created a game where two characters act and fight against their enemies simultaneously thanks to their spiritual bond.

Story of the Game

A ninja and a spiritual warrior have discovered a mask that allows interdimensional communication. As a result of their conversations with each other, they decided to break the wall between dimensions. Thus, their communities can benefit from the sources of the other dimension and become stronger together. However, to achieve this, they must collect soul elixirs of their own dimension. There are 5 number of elixirs on each side and are held by the interdimensional master who exploits both sides. Our characters must infiltrate soul castles in their dimension and seize the elixirs against the guards there.
